level.heading: Mayor to issue rules.
level.text: The Mayor shall issue rules to implement this chapter under the provisions of subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, and the rules shall, at the least, establish a program of community service which may be used, according to an agreement under §§ 8-805(c)(3) and 8-807(e), as an alternative sanction under § 8-807(e).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-100, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-801.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 6-100, the "Litter Control Administration Act of 1985", see Mayor's Order 2000-184, December 5, 2000 (47 DCR 10222).
